EmailTemplate.subject: HAWQ: Hadoop + SQL = Fast
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Experience the World's Fastest Hadoop Distribution Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Now that you have experienced Pivotal HD, would you like to really go in-depth with the amazing SQL Query Speed of HAWQ <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-hd#4>?
As an interface to Hadoop, HAWQ allows you to use familiar SQL operations on petabyte sized data-sets at amazing speed. HAWQ provides support for multiple join SQL statements, ACID transactions, ODBC/JDBC connectivity providing the most flexibility for users. HAWQ <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-hd#4> includes native mature technology:
- A Parallel Query Optimizer – 10 years of innovation in MPP, HAWQ delivers unmatched query optimization that decisively outperforms alternatives. - Dynamic Pipelining – a parallel data flow framework, which implements all the operations that underlie all SQL queries. - Pivotal Extension Frameworks – allows you to run and integrate directly with data sets stored in Hadoop HDFS, Hbase or Hive, cutting latency and reducing duplication or movement of data. - Advanced Analytics Functions - a library of parallelized analytics algorithms (MADLib) to speed analytics development and execution.
Download Now <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/data/pivotal-hd#4>. Want to learn more? Contact us <mailto:sales@gopivotal.com>.
Thank you,
